document_data.name: Imbue Purpose
document_data.refs2e: {{Cite dragon/205/Arcane Lore: New (And Old) Priest And Druid Spells|38}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Imbue purpose''''' was a very rare [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast on a weapon, that weapon's purpose was now to target and slay a targeted species, either sentient or not. If the caster was of good [[alignment]], the targeted species had to be one that was traditionally evil. If a targeted creature was struck by the weapon, they were killed instantly. In the event that the targeted creature was strong enough to avoid being slain, they instead suffered terrible injuries and fled the area as if they were under the influence of a ''[[fear]]'' spell.
document_data.Components: In addition to a [[verbal]] component, this spell required a [[material component]], [[diamond]] dust with a value of at least 1,000 [[gp]].
